meanings.sent1: I love to eat colby with crackers.
meanings.sent2: The sandwich had a slice of colby cheese in it.
meanings.sent3: The mouse dreamed of swimming in a pool of melted colby.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a block of colby cheese.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow color of colby cheese always catches my eye at the store.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Colby is my neighbor down the street.
meanings.sent2: The Colby family reunion is next weekend.
meanings.sent3: The detective suspected that Colby was the mysterious culprit.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like diamonds when she met Mr. Colby.
meanings.sent5: The name Colby has a strong and noble ring to it.
